paragraphs.text: This is a list of mockumentaries. Mockumentary or mock documentary is a genre of film and television, a parody presented as a documentary recording real life.

paragraphs.title: Television
paragraphs.text: Sometimes an episode of an otherwise non-mockumentary series is presented as a mockumentary.

paragraphs.title: Found footage
paragraphs.text: Some films and shows take the form of (fake) raw footage.[4]
